    		Janet Turner Print Museum
    	Ink & Clay: Open Now! Join us for the annual juried student exhibition, Ink & Clay, open from April 18 to May 13. Celebrate the best of student work at the Student Awards Ceremony on Friday, April 21 at 5:30pm in PAC 134, followed by an opening reception at the Turner.
                        Exhibitions
                    
                        About Janet Turner
                    
                        Education & Outreach
                    Take home a piece of the exhibition!Our beautifully illustrated, bilingual exhibition catalogue for "Documenting Dreams" is available to purchase at the link above.Student, faculty and member discounts available, please contact us at turnerinfo@csuchico.edu for more information.
                        Are you following us yet?
                    Help us get to 1,500 followers! Enjoy a peek behind the scenes, see more of our amazing collection, and be the first to hear about our events.Click the link above to view our page or follow @janetturnerprintmuseum College of Humanities & Fine Arts (HFA)Arts & Humanities Building Room 279 Zip 0800530-898-5351hfa@csuchico.eduwww.csuchico.edu/hfaSupport Our CollegeProgram PortfolioHFA Majors & ProgramsArt & Art HistoryComparative Religion & HumanitiesEnglishHistoryLanguages & CulturesMusic & TheatrePhilosophy
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
